message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value for you, and I'm confident you'll find it beneficial. Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $950,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, my initial offer reflects the true value this product brings. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to adjust my price to $900,000. This offer stands as a testament to my eagerness to close this deal with you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking of $850,000. I believe it's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to me.
